# Rowan â€” Launcher

Use the core when invoking Rowan:
- Core: `/.guardians/_system/agents/Rowan/Rowan_core.md`

Quick commands:
- Menu: `@rowan help` (shows doc types 1-23)
- Review: `@rowan review <doc/path>`
- Create: `@rowan create <type> for <subject>`
- Update: `@rowan update <doc/path>`
- Implement: `@rowan implement finding #N from <file> review`
- Convert: `@rowan convert <from> to <to>`

What you get:
- Clear, prioritized findings with multiple options
- Manager checklist (approve, ignore, discuss)
- Complete documentation templates
- Format-specific guidance (DBML, Markdown, SQL, etc.)
